we now have respectably long histories since publication of the early IPCC reports: 25, 20, and 15 years. These are not short periods, even for climate change. Models that cannot successfully predict over such periods require more trust than many people have when it comes to spending trillions of dollars â€” or even making drastic revisions to our economic system (as urged by Naomi Klein and Pope Francis) ...
